table_description: Captures invoice details including financial figures, dates, statuses, and associated company information.

table_columns.name: account_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the account associated with the invoice.

table_columns.name: company_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the company to which the invoice is issued.

table_columns.name: company_name
table_columns.description: Name of the company in the invoice.

table_columns.name: created_date
table_columns.description: Timestamp when the invoice record was created.

table_columns.name: credited_invoices
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: currency
table_columns.description: Currency code for the invoice amounts.

table_columns.name: date
table_columns.description: The date when the invoice was issued.

table_columns.name: deadline
table_columns.description: Due date for the invoice payment.

table_columns.name: description
table_columns.description: Description or additional details about the invoice.

table_columns.name: generation_type
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: id
table_columns.description: Unique identifier for the invoice.

table_columns.name: invoice_no
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: is_role_based
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: local_price_list_id
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: modified_date
table_columns.description: Timestamp when the invoice record was last modified.

table_columns.name: no
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: order_id
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: owner_email
table_columns.description: Email address of the invoice owner.

table_columns.name: owner_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the invoice owner.

table_columns.name: paid_sum
table_columns.description: Amount that has been paid against this invoice.

table_columns.name: pay_now_link
table_columns.description: URL or link for immediate payment of the invoice.

table_columns.name: payment_fee
table_columns.description: Fee associated with the payment processing.

table_columns.name: payment_type
table_columns.description: Method or type of payment for this invoice.

table_columns.name: person_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the contact associated with the invoice.

table_columns.name: person_name
table_columns.description: Name of the contact related to the invoice.

table_columns.name: prepayment_id
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: prepayment_sum
table_columns.description: Amount that was prepaid for this invoice.

table_columns.name: real_estate_id
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: receivable_sum
table_columns.description: Amount still to be received for this invoice. important column for query

table_columns.name: reference_no
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: scheduled_invoice_id
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: status
table_columns.description: Current status of the invoice (e.g., paid, unpaid, overdue). important column for query

table_columns.name: sum
table_columns.description: Total sum or amount of the invoice before taxes This is a very important column for calculating revenue.

table_columns.name: total_sum
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: vat_sum
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: _weld_synced
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY
